description:
Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!
De funestes munitions. Luffy contre les balles excidémiques !
Die bizarrste Waffe - Ruffy im Visier der Seuchenkugeln
Saikyou Heiki! Luffy o Nerau Excite Dan
Безжалостное оружие! Чумные Пули, нацеленные на Луффи!
ذخيرة وحشيّة! تستهدف طلقات الطّاعون لوفي
最凶兵器! ルフィを狙う疫災[エキサイト]弾
